page.title: 04Transport Buses St.Austell 2
page.content: In 1985 the main local service routes are to Newquay,Bodmin,Truro,Mevagissey,St.Bla zey and Fowey. The Cornwall Express Serviuce offers a two_ hourly service to Plymouth and Penzance. The National Express Service offers long distance coaches to destinations all over the country.Also introduced are Rapide Services to London and Scotland.It takes 15 hours to Aberdeen and costs Â£44 return.These are luxury coaches with a hostess to serve refreshments,video and toilets. Sample adult return faresfrom St.Austell:Par,Â£1.10,Mevagissey,Â£1.10, St.Dennis,Â£1.10,Roche,Â£1.10,and Newquay,Â£1.90.
